headline: J&J (JNJ) Faces $8M Verdict Over Talc Case; Stock Still Gains 4.66% YTD
summary: Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ) is one of the 10 undervalued blue chip stocks analysts recommend for smart investing. On June 18, Dean Omar Branham Shirley, LLP, a Dallas, Texas-based law firm, announced an $8 million verdict against Johnson & Johnson in Suffolk County, Massachusetts. The verdict was awarded to Janice Paluzzi, an 84-year-old Massachusetts woman […]

headline: 5 Dividend Stocks Poised to Profit From the AI Efficiency Boom
summary: Boring dividend stocks are becoming the smartest way to profit from AI's efficiency revolution.  Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) is using AI-powered code-completion tools to help developers write code 55% faster.  Johnson & Johnson (NYSE: JNJ) is leveraging AI to accelerate drug-discovery timelines.

headline: Calamos Phineus Long/Short Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
